Description:
Facilitates implementation of new training, development, recruiting, and other related initiatives.
Summarizes HR data and statistics, identifying trends and patterns to inform senior leaders and influence decision-making.
Analyzing HR metrics to recommend policies and activities that improve organizational culture, including strategies to attract and hire top talent, enhance employee engagement and retention, address staffing challenges, and ensure legal compliance.
Examines HR metrics and data to identify trends and patterns related to employee recruitment, retention, and compliance with labor laws and regulations.Skills
Skills:
Experience in the medical field.
General knowledge of Qatar labor law / Qatar law.
Communication & Interpersonal Effectiveness.
Skilled in using HR software and Microsoft Office.
Proficient with HR software and experienced in using Microsoft Office applications.
Skilled in problem-solving and committed to achieving results through effective solutions.
